attributes.action: Stop the Dumpage of Toxic Waste In LEDCs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like to help stop illegal dumping of toxic waste in Ledcs. More and more unwanted tvs, computers..etc are being exported half way across the world to be dumped. This topic is not commonly known and it is important that people know of the harmful effects it has on not only the enviroment but the people including children that are harmed by the dangerous chemicals that are being dumped from our waste in the UK.
